enable_product_review.label: Show product rating
enable_product_review.info: To display the average product rating, add a [product review app](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/products/product-reviews)

color_swatches_setting_header.info: To show the swatches, turn them on in Theme settings>Color swatches

enable_product_darken_background.label: Darken image background
enable_product_darken_background.info: For product images with initially white or transparent background

custom_badge_1_description.content: Create your own badges by linking them to [product tags](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/using-tags)

settings_description.content: We recommend that you use no more than two font families for your store. [Learn how fonts affect the store speed](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

image_picker.label: Favicon image
image_picker.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

cart_free_shipping_bar_threshold.label: Free shipping goal
cart_free_shipping_bar_threshold.info: Fill in the value in your store's main currency. Set up your [shipping rate](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/shipping) to match the goal.

color_swatch_option_name_variants.label: Color option name
color_swatch_option_name_variants.info: Fill in the relevant option name from your admin to turn on color swatches

color_swatch_variables.label: Custom colors
color_swatch_variables.info: Place each rule in a separate line. [Learn how to add color swatches](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/theme-settings/color-swatches)

edge_rounding_degree.label: Edge rounding degree
edge_rounding_degree.info: Applies to cards, buttons, section corners, and other store components

cart.title: Your cart
cart.caption: Cart items
cart.cart_error: There was an error while updating your cart. Please try again
cart.cart_quantity_error_html: You can only add [quantity] items to your cart

login.title: Have an account?
login.paragraph_html: Log in to check out faster

liquid.label: Liquid code
liquid.info: Add app snippets or other Liquid code to create advanced customizations

icon.label: Icon
icon.info_with_link: [See what icon stands for each label.](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/customizations/table-of-icons-and-labels) Without a link the icon disappears

custom_icon_image.label: Custom icon
custom_icon_image.info: Custom icon has priority over selected icon. Recommended size is 256 x 256px

announcement_bar.name: Announcement bar
announcement_bar.language_selector_settings_paragraph: Shows selector on desktop. To add a language, go to your [language settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/languages)
announcement_bar.currency_selector_settings_parapragh: Shows selector on desktop. To add a currency, go to your [payment settings](https://admin.shopify.com/settings/payments)
announcement_bar.social_media_links_settings_parapragh: Shows icons on desktop. Add links to your social media accounts in Theme settings>Social media

header.name: Header
header.images_block_mega_nav_item_name_info: Fill in the menu item name to link the block to. Learn about [mega menu](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/header-and-footer/header#link-header-blocks-to-menu-items)
header.carousel_collection_block_mega_nav_item_: Fill in the menu item name to link the block to. Learn about [mega menu](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/header-and-footer/header#link-header-blocks-to-menu-items).
header.carousel_collection_block_products_info: Products have priority over a collection
header.collection_list_block_mega_nav_item_name: Fill in the menu item name to link the block to. Learn about [mega menu](https://getsitecontrol.gitbook.io/aurora-theme/header-and-footer/header#link-header-blocks-to-menu-items).
